column4: After I installed the mad wifi drivers for my Atheros AR5007EG in the new 2.6.24-21-generic kernel, I can't boot into the new kernel because I get a kernel panic when loading my wireless drivers. How can I fix this problem?
is it giving any information on why it's panicing?
it may or may not be in /var/log/dmesg.0
you could always blacklist the driver temporarily
